Header: Military Police Inter Unit Drill Competition Held
Content: 1 Sri Lanka Corps of Military Police (SLCMP) drill platoon was awarded the 1st place in the Inter Unit Drill Competition of the SLCMP, held on Tuesday (9) at Girithale School of Military Police ground. Colonel A.L Illangakoon, Centre Commandant of the SLCMP graced the event as the Chief Guest and awarded trophies to the winners and their teams. The Commanding Officers of all SLCMP Units participated in the event representing their respective units. The 2nd place and the 3rd place in the competition went to 3 SLCMP Anuradhapura and the 2 SLCMP in Giritale.
